appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appShortName.description: The short name of the application.

appDescription.message: Times your cube solves and displays detailed statistic about it.
appDescription.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

importFilesUnsupported.message: This browser doesn't seem to support the `files` property of file inputs.
importFilesUnsupported.description: The message when the browser doesn't support the files feature of input elements.

importFilesEmpty.message: Please select a file before clicking 'Load'
importFilesEmpty.description: The message when the user hasn't selected anything in the file input dialog.

importServerError.message: Server error while exporting selected file: $message$

timer.description: The name of the link that opens the main view.

config.description: The name of the link that opens the configuration dialog.

hintSpacebar.message: Hint: To start/stop the timer press space bar.
hintSpacebar.description: This hint tells about the spacebar as a short key to start/stop the timer.

scrambleLabel.description: The label indicating how to scramble the cube before solving it.

scrambleLabelNone.description: The label indicating that no scramble is available.

results.description: The label of the results dialog.

actions.description: The actions that may be applied to the result.

buttonCreatePuzzle.description: The button to create the puzzle.

buttonStart.description: The name of the button to start the timer.

buttonStop.description: The name of the button to stop the timer.

buttonImport.description: The name of the button to import results.

buttonExport.description: The name of the button to export results.

exportHeader.description: The header of the export dialog.

windowSize.description: The maximum number of entries in the chart, as a label.

windowSizeDescription.message: The maximum amount of results shown in the chart. When this number is less than 3, or greater than the number of results, all results will be shown.
